gov.fnal.ppd.signage.comm.attic

Class DCClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.fnal.ppd.signage.comm.attic.DCClient
  • Deprecated. 
    -- in favor of using a messaging server

    public class DCClient
extends java.lang.Object
    DC stands for Display Communications Class that connects directly to a single Display server and, asynchronously, tells it what web page to show now.
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab
